p: Where A sample is the absorbance of DPPH mixed with essential oil or terpenes and A blank is the absorbance of DPPH in which sample has been replaced with methanol. All measurements were performed in triplicate and reported as the average value. Butylated hydroxytoluene (BHT, 1.0 mg/mL) (Sigma-Aldrich, Mexico) was used as positive control.
